entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
